data.title: Wandering Stars Anthology Jewish by Jack Editor
data.meta_description: Wandering Stars: An Anthology of Jewish Fantasy and Science Fiction by Dann, Jack (editor) and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Hardcover - Book club edition. Anthology of 13 stories, of which 4 are original stories written for this volume, by noted Jewish authors including Isaac Bashevis Singer, Robert Sheckley, Bernard Malamud, Pamela Sargent, George Alec Effinger, Harlan Ellison and others. Introduction by Isaac Asimov. Drawing on last page. 243 pp. Ex-library with the usual markings, but overall tight and clean in a very good dustjacket.

Hardcover - Book club edition. Anthology of 13 stories, of which 4 are original stories written for this volume, by noted Jewish authors including Isaac Bashevis Singer, Robert Sheckley, Bernard Malamud, Pamela Sargent, George Alec Effinger, Harlan Ellison, Robert Silverberg, and others. Introduction by Isaac Asimov. 243 pp plus a final illustration. Very near fine in a like dustjacket.

Octavo, cloth-backed boards. First edition. The second binding with editor's name corrected from "Dunn" to "Dann" on spine panel. Partially original anthology with thirteen stories, four first published here, by William Tenn, Robert Silverberg, Harlan Ellison, Isaac Asimov, Avram Davidson, Robert Sheckley, and others. Edges of boards a bit faded (as is usually the case), else a fine copy in fine price-clipped dust jacket. (#169727).

Hardcover. Condition: very good. Dust Jacket Condition: very good. Stated first edition. NOT an ex library book. Name barely legible written on dark blue front endpaper. Clean pages. Dust jacket has 1/2" tears, crease on front endflap, no chips, price is not clipped. Newspaper review clipping laid in.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Book Club. Blue buckram with white lettering and small white stars to front cover. Rubbing to head and heel of spine. Someone has drawn a star on the upper corner of half title, text is otherwise clean and bright, no marks. DJ shows rubbing and chips to head and heel of spine and tips of corners, minor general scuffing. With stories by Avram Davidson, Isaac Asimov, Carol Carr, Robert Silverberg, Isaac Bashevis Singer, Geo. Alec Effinger, Pamela Sargent, Bernard Malamud, William Tenn, Harlan Ellison, Horace L. Gold, Robert Sheckley. A showpiece of Jewish wit, culture, and lore, of the blend of humor and sadness, cynicism and faith, that makes up the Jewish literary experience." (from the jacket).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First Edition. Garden City: Doubleday & Company Inc. 1981 Hardcover. 0385170726 . First edition. Collects 15 stories plus an introduction by Isaac Asimov. 180 pages. Remainder spray and owner's name, spine end bumping in Near Fine jacket with two tiny tears to the top edge of the front panel. bx258.
